original_text: Now therefore there is utterly a fault among you, because ye go to law one with another. Why do ye not rather take wrong? why do ye not rather suffer yourselves to be defrauded?
korean_text: 너희가 피차 고발함으로 너희 가운데 이미 뚜렷한 허물이 있나니 차라리 불의를 당하는 것이 낫지 아니하며 차라리 속는 것이 낫지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: Now therefore there is utterly a fault among you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희 중에 온전히 결함이 있나니

sentences.original_text: because ye go to law one with another
Why do ye not rather take wrong?
why do ye not rather suffer yourselves to be defrauded?
